item.title: Xalyus Store cannot download any apps
item.content:encoded:
When downloading an application in Xalyus Store, the app crashes.

2022-02-18T11:19:40.769Z
Resolved

A fix for Xalyus Store is now rolling out to everyone. Thanks for your patience. Note that if cannot install it, we strongly recommand you reinstall Xalyus Store by downloading it again here.

2022-02-18T08:55:19.184Z
Monitoring

We found the cause of the issue and we are working on a fix. Howerver, it might get released later this day. You can use our website to download our apps if needed.

item.title: RAWG API Down
item.content:encoded:
The RAWG API is currently unavailable, some features of Gavilya no longer work.

2021-12-07T14:24:34.302Z
Resolved

The issue is now resolved. All Gavilya's services should work as expected.

2021-12-06T19:50:22.889Z
Monitoring

Here what's new since the last update:

  • The RAWG API is still unavailable.
  • Gavilya's update system is working as expected, and there is no issues about it.
  • We have changed the severity to "Partial outage" since all of Gavilya's services except RAWG are working and performing as expected.
  • We won't update this status page until next day, the issue may take some time to resolve.
  • This issue is NOT related to any Léo Corporation's service.

Thank you for your patience.

2021-12-06T15:40:32.659Z
Monitoring

We are closely monitoring the situation and we'll keep you updated about any significant development.

How Gavilya is affected

Since the API isn't currently available, you'll see lots of error messages if you have linked your games to the RAWG database. This issue shouldn't however, cause a crash of the app.

item.title: The website doesn't look like normal
item.content:encoded:
Titles, buttons and more, aren't displaying as properly.

2021-09-08T12:13:32.456Z
Resolved

The issue has been resolved, our websites should look like normal.

item.title: Elements of the website aren't displaying correctly.
item.content:encoded:
Some elements of the website aren't displaying correctly.

2021-08-27T18:12:13.784Z
Resolved

The issue has been resolved, our websites should look like normal.

2021-08-27T10:35:32.580Z
Monitoring

The issue isn't fixed yet, but the problem is probably linked to TailwindCSS classes. We are monitoring and following closely the ongoing situation. Websites below are impacted:

  • leocorporation.dev
  • privacy.leocorporation.dev
  • gavilya.leocorporation.dev
  • datalya.leocorporation.dev
